languages.original_text: Вокс в наручниках с треском оживает: "Повинен пред ликом Императора".

languages.text: 嵌在手铐里的音阵装置发出了嘶嘶的响声：“我愿在帝皇面前承认我的罪行。”
languages.original_text: The vox embedded in the handcuffs crackles to life: "I bear my guilt before the visage of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 嵌在手铐里的音阵装置发出了嘶嘶的响声：“我愿在帝皇面前承认我的罪行。”

languages.text: Le vox intégré aux menottes s'anime en grésillant : « Je porte ma culpabilité devant l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: The vox embedded in the handcuffs crackles to life: "I bear my guilt before the visage of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: Le vox intégré aux menottes s'anime en grésillant : « Je porte ma culpabilité devant l'Empereur. »

languages.text: El voco integrado en las esposas restalla: «Porto mi culpa frente al semblante del Emperador».
languages.original_text: The vox embedded in the handcuffs crackles to life: "I bear my guilt before the visage of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: El voco integrado en las esposas restalla: «Porto mi culpa frente al semblante del Emperador».

languages.text: 手錠に埋め込まれたヴォクスが鳴り響く。「皇帝の御前で、我が罪を背負わん」
languages.original_text: The vox embedded in the handcuffs crackles to life: "I bear my guilt before the visage of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 手錠に埋め込まれたヴォクスが鳴り響く。「皇帝の御前で、我が罪を背負わん」

languages.text: Kelepçenin içine gömülü voks, cızırdayarak canlanıyor: "Suçumun yükünü İmparator'un nuru huzurunda taşırım."
languages.original_text: The vox embedded in the handcuffs crackles to life: "I bear my guilt before the visage of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: Kelepçenin içine gömülü voks, cızırdayarak canlanıyor: "Suçumun yükünü İmparator'un nuru huzurunda taşırım."

languages.text: Das Vox in den Handschellen erwacht knackend zum Leben: "Ich trage meine Schuld vor dem Antlitz des Imperators."
languages.original_text: The vox embedded in the handcuffs crackles to life: "I bear my guilt before the visage of the Emperor."
